xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 24 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 04:54 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 05:06 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 05:08 <bvancea> hey mcupak 05:08 <bvancea> what's up 05:08 <bvancea> ? 05:09 <mcupak> bvancea: hey, how was it going? 05:10 <bvancea> pretty good, playing around, indexing some data 05:10 <bvancea> you? 05:12 <mcupak> good 05:12 <mcupak> trying to run some experiments with sharding 05:12 <mcupak> hopefully with some good performance results 05:13 <bvancea> did you manage to shard infobright? 05:13 <bvancea> niceee 05:15 <mcupak> that would be the whole project, sort of :D 05:15 <mcupak> just working with some fixed data sets for now 05:17 <bvancea> oh 05:17 <bvancea> but you're running more instances of infobright? 05:17 <bvancea> ;)) 05:21 <mcupak> actually not atm, but that is the goal 05:21 <bvancea> I'm really curious how hard sharding an inforbirght instance 05:21 <bvancea> since most people don't like sharding mysql 05:21 <bvancea> except facebook 05:21 <bvancea> :)) 05:22 <mcupak> well medsavant has a pretty limited set of queries it runs, that should make things a lot simpler 05:23 <bvancea> could be 05:24 <bvancea> and there aren't any join on the variant search 05:24 <bvancea> which is nice 05:25 <mcupak> yeah 05:25 <mcupak> hopefully I'll have more time to look into it now, I've been pretty busy with school lately 05:26 <mcupak> I'm sure you know what I mean ;) 05:26 <bvancea> hehe 05:26 <bvancea> yeah 05:26 <bvancea> you're in the final year aswell? 05:26 <mcupak> I'll be finishing next year 05:27 <bvancea> ah, I see 05:27 <bvancea> and you're in the middle of the examination session? 05:28 <mcupak> I'm done with the exams now, just had to finish a project 05:31 <bvancea> ah, I see 05:31 <bvancea> nice 05:32 <mcupak> are you done with your exams? 05:32 <bvancea> yup, finished last week 08:51 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 09:04 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 09:19 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu, you on? 09:19 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 09:19 <sdumitriu> Yes 09:19 <bvancea> oh lol, I was waiting for sdumitriu1 to get on :)) 09:21 <bvancea> I'm writing my status and I trying to dedice on what to focus this week 09:22 <bvancea> should I try to integrate the variant core into medsavant? or create new cores for other entities, like chromoses 09:26 <sdumitriu> Let's start the integration 09:28 <bvancea> nice 09:28 <bvancea> :D 09:29 <bvancea> so I've managed to finish a simple java class that builds a query from normal terms and filter terms and gets a response from Solr 09:29 <bvancea> for performance testing 09:30 <bvancea> now I just need to think of some tests that will simulate normal user interaction 09:38 <bvancea> I'll start by just adding longer queries 11:41 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:41 <bvancea> I keep disconnecting :| 13:06 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 16:58 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 16:58 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 16:58 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 16:58 <bvancea> hey sdumitru1 16:58 <sdumitriu1> Still disconnecting? 16:59 <bvancea> should be fine now 16:59 <bvancea> :) 17:00 <bvancea> my love-hate relationship with the campus internet is going towards away from the love 17:00 <bvancea> anyway, you mentioned a call with mcupak 17:01 <bvancea> on the response email for the status 17:01 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:01 <sdumitriu1> Well, not now 17:01 <sdumitriu1> We need to schedule it first 17:02 <bvancea> well yeah 17:02 <sdumitriu1> At the latest, it could be at the common hangout next week 17:02 <bvancea> hmmm 17:02 <bvancea> I would prefer it this week 17:02 <sdumitriu1> OK 17:02 <bvancea> the sooner the better imo 17:03 <bvancea> I guess Miro will also participate 17:03 <sdumitriu1> And Marc 17:03 <bvancea> and marc 17:03 <bvancea> yes 17:05 <bvancea> so when would be a good date for that? 17:05 <sdumitriu1> I'm mostly free 17:06 <sdumitriu1> Send a reply asking for a date from the others 17:06 <sdumitriu1> We could Doodle it 17:06 <bvancea> Doodle it? 17:06 <bvancea> :)) 17:06 <sdumitriu1> http://doodle.com/ 17:06 <bvancea> wow 17:06 <bvancea> nice 17:07 <sdumitriu1> It's good for finding a common time 17:07 <bvancea> hehe 17:07 <bvancea> cool 17:07 <bvancea> did you start one? 17:08 <bvancea> with Doodle, I mean 17:08 <bvancea> or can I do it? 17:10 <sdumitriu1> You can do it 17:10 <bvancea> nice, commit rights 17:11 <bvancea> thanks 17:12 <bvancea> Doodle looks really nice 17:12 <bvancea> hmmm 17:12 <bvancea> so if I choose a timezone in Doodle, when you see the event 17:13 <bvancea> do you see time corresponding to your timezone? 17:13 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:13 <sdumitriu1> I think so 17:14 <bvancea> hmm 17:14 <bvancea> ok 17:17 <bvancea> somehow I managed to finish it without inviting anyone 17:17 <bvancea> http://doodle.com/e49wse69ubd3c5wg 17:17 <bvancea> is it ok? 17:18 <bvancea> what time do you see? 17:18 <sdumitriu1> That's a broad time range... 17:18 <sdumitriu1> 11-5 17:18 <bvancea> hmmm 17:18 <bvancea> thats ok 17:18 <sdumitriu1> 11AM-5AM 17:19 <sdumitriu1> I don't think anybody wants to do this at 3AM... 17:19 <bvancea> should I set lower intervals 17:19 <sdumitriu1> Yes 17:19 <bvancea> okay 17:19 <sdumitriu1> Make 2 intervals per day 17:20 <bvancea> so when are the times when people normally get to the lab? 17:20 <sdumitriu1> Let's say 11-13 and 14-16 17:20 <bvancea> ah 17:20 <bvancea> ok 17:20 <sdumitriu1> After 16 is getting too late for you 17:20 <sdumitriu1> And before 11 people may not be available 17:21 <bvancea> thats what I thoght when I wrote 11 and not 9 ;)) 17:21 <sdumitriu1> Wednesday's not good for you? 17:21 <bvancea> not sure about the time wednesday 17:21 <bvancea> we should be having some group pictures taken for the diploma 17:21 <bvancea> with the whole year 17:22 <bvancea> last time it was tried, half didnt show up 17:22 <bvancea> I not sure how long that's gonna take 17:22 <bvancea> and its set sometime between after AM my time 17:22 <sdumitriu1> OK 17:25 <bvancea> http://doodle.com/e49wse69ubd3c5wg 17:25 <bvancea> are the times ok now? 17:26 <bvancea> so I've figured I can come on wednesday aswell 17:26 <bvancea> 14-16 toronto time 17:26 <sdumitriu1> Times are wrong... 17:26 <sdumitriu1> It's 2AM-4AM 17:27 <bvancea> how about now? 17:27 <sdumitriu1> 2AM-4PM 17:27 <sdumitriu1> The 14-hours meeting, a great way to start the day 17:28 <bvancea> :( 17:28 <bvancea> should be only 2 hours now 17:30 <sdumitriu1> Looks good 17:31 <bvancea> you should be getting an email 17:31 <bvancea> right about now 17:39 <sdumitriu1> Did you invite the others as well? 17:39 <sdumitriu1> Or you can send the link in a reply to my reply 17:44 <bvancea> I invited everyone 17:44 <bvancea> but its safer I send the reply as well 17:48 <bvancea> gmail is so funny sometimes 17:48 <bvancea> keeps asking me if I want to invite Medsavant to gmail 17:48 <bvancea> :) 17:49 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, I don't like social apps that invite every email address that's in in your GMail, and such invites are sent to mailing lists with thousands of subscribers... 17:50 <bvancea> lol 17:50 <sdumitriu1> If you see Miro on IRC before me, kindly remind him to send the weekly status email 17:50 <bvancea> and every subscriber gets the invite email? 17:50 <bvancea> he was on earlier today 17:51 <bvancea> before lunch, my time 17:51 <bvancea> I'll let him know tomorrow morning, if he's here 17:51 <sdumitriu1> Yes, but not for them personally, "dear GSoC students discussion list, you've been invited to join..." 17:51 <bvancea> haha, that must be funny 17:51 <bvancea> for the first 2 mails 17:51 <sdumitriu1> Yes, read the conversation 17:51 <bvancea> then really annoying 17:52 <bvancea> so, there's a big change the meeting is not friday evening 17:52 <bvancea> my girlfriend will be happy 17:54 <sdumitriu1> Tomorrow morning or Thursday seem the best candidates 17:54 <sdumitriu1> Let's see what Miro says 17:55 <bvancea> yup 17:56 <bvancea> just noticed you asked how much it took to index the 700k variants 17:56 <bvancea> around 3 minutes 17:56 <bvancea> sorry, didn't see it 17:58 <sdumitriu1> Decent, IMHO 17:58 <bvancea> yeah 17:58 <bvancea> I should check how much it takes medsavant to save the same numbers to the database 18:15 <bvancea> who is Jim? 18:15 <bvancea> :) 18:15 <sdumitriu1> Our newest developer 18:15 <sdumitriu1> Postdoc 18:15 <bvancea> ah, cool 18:51 <sdumitriu1> Going home 18:51 <sdumitriu1> Bye 18:51 <bvancea> bye 18:51 <bvancea> I'll probably hit the bed too 18:51 <bvancea> good night
